meanings.definition: The art of carving or engraving designs on whalebone or ivory.
meanings.sent1: She admired the intricate scrimshaw displayed in the museum.
meanings.sent2: The sailor showed off his collection of scrimshaw to the curious children.
meanings.sent3: The scrimshaw artist accidentally carved a funny face on the whalebone.
meanings.sent4: Her scrimshaw work was as delicate as a spider's web.
meanings.sent5: The scrimshaw on the ivory piece told a story of the sea.

meanings.sent1: The scrimshaw on the shelf caught her eye with its detailed carvings.
meanings.sent2: He treasured the scrimshaw gifted to him by his grandfather.
meanings.sent3: The scrimshaw on the necklace seemed to wink at her playfully.
meanings.sent4: The scrimshaw on the mantle seemed to whisper tales of the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The scrimshaw in the antique shop had a mysterious aura.

meanings.definition: To carve or engrave designs on whalebone or ivory.
meanings.sent1: She carefully scrimshawed her initials on the ivory pendant.
meanings.sent2: The artist scrimshawed a beautiful mermaid on the whalebone.
meanings.sent3: He decided to scrimshaw a tiny boat sailing on the ivory.
meanings.sent4: The scrimshawed patterns on the whalebone seemed to dance in the light.
meanings.sent5: Scrimshawing the intricate design took hours of patience and skill.
